welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weslaco, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all it has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mc Allen Miller International Airport, used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gen Lucio Blanco Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Valley International Airport features a modern design and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Valley International Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
